transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using an allowance.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens and calls a function on the spender contract.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

setOwner.description: Sets a new owner for the contract.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

seal.description: Seals the contract, preventing further minting.

offerBonus.description: Offers a bonus to the specified amount.

isSealed.description: Checks if the contract is sealed.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the specified address.

lastMintedTimestamp.description: Returns the timestamp of the last mint operation.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made.
